Public Member Functions
gaia::core::IValueAnimatorUpdateListener Class Reference

Implementors of this interface can add themselves as update listeners to an ValueAnimator instance to receive callbacks on every animation frame, after the current frame's values have been calculated for that ValueAnimator. More...

#include <IValueAnimatorUpdateListener.h>

virtual void onAnimationUpdate (ValueAnimator *animation)=0
 Notifies the occurrence of another frame of the animation.

Detailed Description

Implementors of this interface can add themselves as update listeners to an ValueAnimator instance to receive callbacks on every animation frame, after the current frame's values have been calculated for that ValueAnimator.
